name: International Socialist University
uniques: Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [-75]% more Influence
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [10]
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [10] <after adopting [Patronage Complete]>
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [10] <after adopting [Order Complete]>
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [5] <after discovering [Education]>
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [5] <after discovering [Printing Press]>
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Science] equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves
Allied City-States provide [Culture] equal to [25]% of what they produce for themselves
Triggers a global alert upon build start
quote: For half a century, under the guidance of the great banner of Marxism-Leninism and under the light of the October Revolution, the world has undergone earth-shaking changes. Now, the flames of the October Revolution are burning all over the earth.—— 'Advance along the road opened by the October Socialist Revolution'
